website_summaries.verdict: This toy is appropriate for toddlers, and those who are a fan of Mickey Mouse Clubhouse will love this set.
pros: Easy assembly and sturdy toy that is appealing to little kids
Looks identical to Mickey Clubhouse as seen on the TV show
Includes a Mickey figurine in bright colors that toddlers will love
cons: Slide is not permanently attached to rest of toy

customer_reviews.title: I did place the toy on top of the cake just before singing happy birthday. My son LOVED the cake and especially ...
customer_reviews.text: Took a chance in spite of the reviews and used this as a cake topper. It worked fabulously on a three-quarter sheet cake. No reinforcements were necessary. I did place the toy on top of the cake just before singing happy birthday. My son LOVED the cake and especially the keepsake toy. :)
customer_reviews.author: learn17

customer_reviews.title: Fun and cute toy son loves; falls apart easily
customer_reviews.text: I'm torn with this item. It's an adorable toy and my 18 month old LOVES it. He plays with it more than anything else he got for Christmas. It's a good size and really would be cute for a birthday party decoration. We bought the Disney Little People character set to go with it and it works great. But after only a week of play, it was falling apart just from normal daily play. Not made well. We find ourselves reassembling it all the time. Otherwise it would be a great toy.
customer_reviews.author: JPAUBURN

customer_reviews.title: Just like on TV
customer_reviews.text: So cute. It looks just like Mickey's clubhouse on TV. Yes, as others have noted, Mickey is very hard to keep in his car. We finally gave up and sent him down the slide without his car, which is much less exciting. But it is cute, and we purchased his friends separately to make it more fun. If the problem of Mickey falling out of his car was fixed, it would be 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Two year old loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Our 2 year old granddaughter just loves the MIckey Mouse Clubhouse, and all things Mickey-related. I hesitated about buying this because of some reviews saying it was flimsy, but after we assembled it last night, she played with it today and it was fine. My husband did assemble it very carefully. The directions are OK but you have to be careful you are turning it the right way to match the illustrations, and also to push the connecting pieces in place completely. We also bought the set of little characters so she could have more to play with. I do wish it came with removable furniture pieces and with a Toodles character!
customer_reviews.author: ARC

customer_reviews.title: A headache.
customer_reviews.text: My boys (3 and 4) love this toy, but it falls apart constantly. Any time they try to move it the pieces come apart and I have to put it all back together again. I have tried to superglue it together, but since it is slick plastic it won't stick. I really wanted to love this as much as my sons do, but I'm ready for it to be donated.
customer_reviews.author: K. Groves

customer_reviews.title: Fragile~Not for the Rough and Tumble kiddo
customer_reviews.text: Great playhouse and would probably be a wonderful toy for a gentle child. Every piece falls apart easily with our rough and tumble boy. The dog also joined in on the fun and chewed up one part that actually looks like one of her bones (Nylabone). It only lasted a few hours in the hands of my 4 year old but he's not the gentle type so use your own judgement.
customer_reviews.author: Mr & Mrs Bartalone

customer_reviews.title: Just OK.
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad toy, just not a great toy. The quality of good and the set up is easy, it has a flaw. The Mickey should be able to slide down the blue slide and land in the red car. The Mickey gets stuck on the slide, so child has to keep pushing it. Then at the end it gets caught before it lands in the car. If it does make it into the car, the Mickey will tip over and get stuck in the garage when opened. This became very frustrating to my toddler. He enjoys the car separate from the play set. I’m a little sad that it wasn’t a bigger hit, but it’s understandable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon shopper 4 many years

customer_reviews.title: Wish it was a little more like a dill house type but it is exactly what ...
customer_reviews.text: My child was asking for a clubhouse for her Mickey and friends. Wish it was a little more like a dill house type but it is exactly what it says it is. I just couldn't bring myself to pay the major money for a bigger one. My child loves this one and as children do, uses the imagination to make it whatever it needs to be at the time. Great for the price. The bottom end of the hand slide/balloon slide comes unattached sometimes but what doeant with a 2 year old playing with it. Happy with product.
customer_reviews.author: Jaclynn Howell

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This toy is okay. Our kids play with it but is seems very cheaply made and not sturdy. The characters usually fall off the slide when you try to put them down the slide. The rope mechanism rarely works well and is not sturdy. The only good feature of the toy is the shoe part because there is a button to press to open it. Overall I wouldn't purchase this again. Which is sad because both kids love Mickey Mouse Clubhouse.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: This product was not worth the money. The pieces do not interlock well. I had to bend some ofhe plastic in order to get it to fit somewhat. And the car that comes with it is too big for the slide. That’s supposed to be the best part of it.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Abbott

customer_reviews.title: Simple and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: My three-year-old daughter likes this toy, but I can already see her interest fading. However, it was very easy to put together and sturdy. I also liked that the manufacturer didn't try to overcomplicate things and add a zillion useless features. No batteries required either, which is always a bonus in my book! That being said, I can see this going to Goodwill next year.
customer_reviews.author: PA mom

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but I have to reassemble often.
customer_reviews.text: Very cute. Easy to put together. But, just as easily falls apart. It’s super annoying trying to put my 3 year olds toy back together after he knocked it apart being rough with it. He has some other “little people” sets he could chuck out the window, and they would stay together perfectly. So, if putting the pieces together anywhere from occasionally (Gentle child) to constantly (Tanzanian devil like my child) doesn’t bother you, it is one of just the few Mickey Mouse play sets out there.
customer_reviews.author: BrandiD

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: I kinda can't believe I spent 60 bucks on this. My son loves it, because he loves Mickey. My husband works with his hands and builds things for a living. Neither of us had an easy time assembling what seems to be a few items. Doesn't stay together well. It doesn't even function. Maybe MAYBE if this toy was like 15 or 20 bucks. I do not understand the price point.
customer_reviews.author: Lionheart

customer_reviews.title: Don't trust it
customer_reviews.text: Well, it's really cute. I'll give it credit for that. However, when my 3 yr old picked up one of the characters, and bent his legs, the pad of her finger got stuck in it. She's screaming, but managed to get it off herself. needless to say, I wouldn't recommend them to anyone. The actual clubhouse doesn't have much actual play ability. It falls apart and there's really nothing to do.
customer_reviews.author: Ptmom8

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for your Mickey Mouse Clubhouse loving kid!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 2 year olds birthday and he is obsessed with it. It was easy to put together and works great. Mickey slides down the slide and right in to his car.
customer_reviews.author: RachelLynnPhoto

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: It's okay. It was what my son really wanted for Christmas and he barely plays with it. It would be better if the car could go down the slide and their were more interactive features. The characters are suppose to slide down and then end up in the garage where the car is. I think it needs some improvements for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mmm77

customer_reviews.title: The Car is too big to the track
customer_reviews.text: The car is too big it does not even fit on the track, very disappointing. My son who has autism was very upset that the car did not properly fit :( thus the toy is only for imaginary play or smaller cars, (not included). Overall bad design. This review is in regards to the product itself and not the seller.
customer_reviews.author: crystal

customer_reviews.title: Cute toy! Looks like the show
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves it! (She was 19 months old at the time of purchase.) Plays with it everyday and loves to point at the TV when the actual show comes on. She carries the Mickey figurine around everywhere and we purchased (separately) the other characters to go with it. Still loves playing with it three months later.
customer_reviews.author: Steven W.

customer_reviews.title: Decent size but falls apart easily
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised at how large this playset was. The only problem I had is that it was kind of flimsy. Anytime my kids would try to move it around from one location to another, a part would come detached. And then they would lose insterest because it was “broken.” We got pretty annoyed with how often we were having to put the pieces back together.
customer_reviews.author: Miles Long

customer_reviews.title: Cute idea, poor execution
customer_reviews.text: The clubhouse is cute when put together, and my 1 year old son loves sending Mickey down the slide and popping the car out of the garage. However, this set does not stay together at all. The slide pieces look like they are made to snap into place, but they don't, and anytime we try to move the clubhouse a piece falls off. The hot air balloon part is a little better, but loses its appeal after a few trips down. We spend more time trying to put this set back together than actually playing with.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Hot dog!Mickeys playhouse
customer_reviews.text: Came packaged well.Cutest Mickey toy ever!Bright colors.ool zip line.Not too much to put together.Too simple to talk about.Came with a Mickey Mouse toy.Would like to see more characters in set.Not too much fun with only one.Still cute and good buy.Would buy more characters to go with before gifting.
customer_reviews.author: theresaspradlin

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for a 2 year old
customer_reviews.text: Great, sturdy gift! This was for my 2 year old and she’s played with it daily for 2 weeks. The glove balloon slides on the rope; Mickey can go down the slide and land in the garage; and the garage door opens and launches the car with the push of a button. It’s a nice gift for a Clubhouse fan.
customer_reviews.author: MommaLazer

customer_reviews.title: Very fun toy!
customer_reviews.text: Lots of fun and easy to assemble. The only downside is basket does not stay up by the clubhouse- not a huge deal. Only took me 5 minutes to assemble holding a baby and 2 young children "helping." The car doesnt go down the slide, Mickey does and lands in the car. The car is the the just the right size to go on little people tracks.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!! Holding up well to a very active toddler!
customer_reviews.text: This exceeded expectations after reading some of the other reviews. Our three year old has played hard with it daily for over a week and we’ve yet to have to deal with any problems or re-assembly. Great addition to our Disney play sets!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Howe

customer_reviews.title: Cute toy!
customer_reviews.text: This was the #1 toy our son wanted for Christmas and he LOVES it. If he is too rough or carries it wrong, it will come part but it is easy to snap back together, otherwise it is a cute toy for any Mickey fan!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley McLeod

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loves this!
customer_reviews.text: We went to a Birthday party for our grandson a few weeks ago. He got lots of presents as you can guess. But when they got home, my daughter sent us pictures of him playing with our toy. And it helps that he loves Mickey Mouse and watches those shows all the time. This one is a winner.
customer_reviews.author: R. D. Frazier

customer_reviews.title: Cute toy
customer_reviews.text: Wound up being pleasantly surprised with this one. Our 3 year old loves Clubhouse and it’s not easy to find toys since the show has been discontinued. It doesn’t hold his attention as long as I had hoped, but it’s a pretty cute toy that works well.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves this! It looks just like the clubhouse he watches on tv. The figures can ride in the balloon, slide down the slide and zoom out in the car. Once it's put together it stays together, pieces don't come loose or fall off. Nice quality and lots of playtime
customer_reviews.author: paula howard

customer_reviews.title: Huge hit!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my 4 year old for Christmas, cus he really got into Mickey Mouse Clubhouse in the last few months. He totally loves it! It only comes with the one little character, but we have lots of other small character toys that fit with this play set and it really gets his imagination going which is so fun to see.
customer_reviews.author: Ben and Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Toys for Tots
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to donate to Toys for Tots. It arrived and the box did say it was part of the Roadster TV show. I checked it and put it together and it was durable and nice. I am sure that whatever child got it this Christmas probably enjoyed it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: Very cute house! Wish the car that came with it held more than one character seeing I bought the pack of the other characters to go with it. My toddler loves the balloon zip line!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffanie

customer_reviews.title: Mickey Mouse Fun
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter is in love with this Disney item. Bought it for Christmas; she is 2 1/2 years old. Everything works perfectly and hours of fun play. Only wish the slide was permently attached as she likes to carry it by the air/rope slide and it comes undone. I foresee this breaking soon and the tears streaming when grandma can’t fix it.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma K

customer_reviews.title: So cute all put together!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift for my niece. She absolutely loved it!!! She couldn’t wait to get it out of the box and put together. It took a little work to get all the pieces together, but if you have a little Mickey Mouse fan, then I definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: 2 Brothers Play

customer_reviews.title: Not a track
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was a track for mickey mouse, but it is a slide. I think he is supposed to slide and land in his car. The slide is constantly falling off though, and it's annoying. It's a good toy; however, I only paid $15 for it and I wouldn't pay anymore than that for it.
customer_reviews.author: Beryl

customer_reviews.title: Better products than this available
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money at all. Cheap construction, doesn't work. The car doesn't drive down the ramp. The Mickey character can't slide easily, and he immediately falls out of the bucket. The zip line doesn't go most of the time. My 22 mo old likes it well for now but does not use as intended.
customer_reviews.author: CurlyQsParents

customer_reviews.title: Expected more from Disney
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed with the quality, durability and playability of this product. Got it for my 2 year old’s birthday and he played with it only a handful of times; it didn’t offer enough to keep him busy. He does enjoy playing with the individual characters, though the paint quality on those is disappointing as well.
customer_reviews.author: KC Toes

customer_reviews.title: My Mickey fan was so elated he refused to open any other birthday gift.
customer_reviews.text: We assembled this before gifting it to my 3 year old great grandson. He couldnt have been more excited. There were other Mickey related gifts at his party but this was the only one he opened and played with. So glad I preassembled it so I could enjoy him playing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: played with often
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his MMCH. It gets played with often, and that was 2018 christmas almost 2 years and sill running high, I’d say it’s a great toy !!!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole R

customer_reviews.title: Very interactive.
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter loves this. Watches the show and plays with the characters. Mickey with his car are a favorite. Wish his pals were included. Had to buy separately.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Good toy
customer_reviews.text: We just received it. It is what my son was expecting. My husband and my son put it together in 10 minutes. We are really satisfied with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ahlam

customer_reviews.title: Cute but....
customer_reviews.text: Cute but not a value for the price. My grandson likes it, but it snaps apart in play and balloon ship falls unexpectedly. limited functions, tires of toy too easily
customer_reviews.author: katie

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t stay together well
customer_reviews.text: My daughter absolutely loves the toy—when t stays together. The green section clicks undone quite easily with play which ruins the ‘zipline’ feature. She can’t click it back herself so loses interest. When it stayed together (the first 2 days) she played with it for multiple hours at a time.
customer_reviews.author: rb

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: My son is 2 and daughter is 4. We got this for my son for Christmas and he loves it! They actually both played with it for a long time at one sitting which never happens with toys
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy as heck
customer_reviews.text: I have mixed feelings about this toy. I looooved it and so did my son but it falls apart so easily! I have to reassemble every time my son touches it. The only reason I'm giving it a 3 star :( as long as you don't touch it, it looks fun and adorable.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Yep yep good good
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, especially for me. I suck at assembly/putting things together. Also bought the Mickey figurines to go along with it because Mickey only comes. Needed the whole gang.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Mickey Mickey Mickey
customer_reviews.text: Mickey is a household favorite. This toy is played with everyday. Please note the toy car does not fit down the slide, the characters do and fall into the car that can be stored in the little garage.
customer_reviews.author: MommaOfFive

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Used this as my daughters cake topper on a large sheet cake and it was awesome and now she loves to play with it!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: 2yo loves it
customer_reviews.text: This is great but the pieces do come unwrapped occasionally and we really wish the car could go down the slide.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: The grandkids love it and it is cute but tends to come apart easily. Super glue what you can.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: My 3yo loves his clubhouse and the figurine set that ...
customer_reviews.text: My 3yo loves his clubhouse and the figurine set that we bought separately. This clubhouse comes with a Mickey and so does the set - FYI so you end up with two Mickeys and zero Daisys. He doesn't care though and plays with this house frequently, even a month after his birthday!
customer_reviews.author: AMLWalker

customer_reviews.title: It's Mickey, and the car comes flying out the garage.
customer_reviews.text: My son(4) liked it once we got it together but a couple of the pieces snap together pretty hard. He has played with it quite a bit and after almost two months nothing is broken. He loves Mickey Mouse Clubhouse and his eyes got huge when he saw the box it came in. I would recommend if you child likes Mickey and playing with cars too.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Stars?
customer_reviews.text: Package previously opened. Package feedback unavailable. Product falls apart. Daughter gets frustrated with it. She wants to play with it, but it wont stay together. I'm assuming this was the reason I was sent a used toy instead of a new one. Update: it's in the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: tam

customer_reviews.title: Adorable! Great for my 2 year old nephew
customer_reviews.text: Got for my two year old nephew and he loved it! A lot bigger than I thought it was too!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Spooner

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my 2 year old niece and she loved it! It hasn't held up all that well, with pieces coming apart but she is not especially dainty and careful but rather rough. It's a really cute toy and entertaining. I did purchase an additional set of all of the other Mickey Mouse Clubhouse characters to go along with it, which made a complete gift!
customer_reviews.author: M. Browne

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My 9 month old loves Mickey Mouse so I bought him this toy and so far he loves it. It is fun enough for children up to probably 7 years old to want to play with. I did order more figurines separately in case that Mickey gets lost.
customer_reviews.author: stefanie

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: Love it! My 2yo is having a blast! I read some reviews saying it falls apart constantly but fortunately not happened here (ps: we have it for a day).
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Good find, reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 4 year old nephew. He loves it. Plays with it all of the time. Good find.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzy

customer_reviews.title: Loved this toy!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my 2 yr old son. Based on the comments, I was feeling doubtful about this toy, because of the mixed reviews, but ended getting it anyways. My son loves it, and haven't had any issues with it. It does come off, if you pull really hard (which my son has), but its easy to snap back on. Would recommend. :)
customer_reviews.author: Stefany

customer_reviews.title: Really small and comes apart easily. Also it is flimsy which makes me believe ...
customer_reviews.text: Really small and comes apart easily. Also it is flimsy which makes me believe it isnt very good quality. And Mickey doesnt look very well thought out and kinda thrown together. The car is small as well. The glove balloon part comes off from the base alot.
customer_reviews.author: Blake Weems

customer_reviews.title: Durable and interactive
customer_reviews.text: This toy is the bomb! Our 2 year old granddaughter absolutely loves it. She got it for Christmas, and it was a hit for all the kids aged 1 to 8. Even rambunctious play, competing for use, didn’t phase this thing. After a month she still loves it and plays with it everyday. Throwing it around or lovingly talking to Mickey in the car, all of it is still perfectly intact. An total win for any clubhouse fan
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Could have been nicer
customer_reviews.text: For the price I was expecting something nicer. Cheaply made. Neither one of my grandsons (ages 2 & 4) play with this.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it. Don’t expect the car to fit down the slide though, it’s more for hot wheels. Mickey slides down though. Easy to assemble. Both babies love this
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a Christmas present. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my grandson who is 17 mo old and he absolutely loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Mickey doesn’t fit in the car exactly and falls out easily
customer_reviews.author: Dearra

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected, a lot smaller than I thought, great for a 1-2 year old, not my 4 year old
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: My nephew loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my nephew for Christmas and he absolutely loves it! He even sleeps with the figurine now! Haha! He has requested the other characters because he does nothing but play with this toy! It holds up really well to a rambunctious three year old and his seven month old little brother. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Renee Talbert

customer_reviews.title: Is as expected
customer_reviews.text: There isn't a ton to this product, but my child loves it. Certainly, the balloon ride to the bottom and the shoe/garage is a hit.
customer_reviews.author: RLW

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 2 year old daughter who loves Mickey mouse clubhouse and was so pleased with this purchase. Its bigger then i expected and i can't wait to give it to her for Christmas
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Bouska

customer_reviews.title: Ideal gift
customer_reviews.text: Love the colors and movements that capture the child’s attention
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Beaumont

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t stay together, not very usable.
customer_reviews.text: I was not impressed with this toy at all. The green part on the left and the rope slide thing don’t stay attached. It does not hold up to a 2 year old boy at all. He lost interest in minutes. I’m sure there are better toys out there for MMCH fans.
customer_reviews.author: Caffeinatedkate

customer_reviews.title: my 4 year old loves it,
customer_reviews.text: fairly easy to assemble, would recommend putting all the stickers on in advance if your child wants to help put it together
customer_reviews.author: KJ138

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: My 2yr old son loves this toy. He plays with it everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Vrob

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Our two year old daughter loves it. The only issue I have is that the pieces holding the slide on keep coming apart. It goes back together easily enough but it does come apart.
customer_reviews.author: Bud Dogood

customer_reviews.title: Good toy?
customer_reviews.text: I’m assuming this toy is awesome. I have to assume because we gave it as a birthday present and never received a thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Fliberty-jibet

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not for young kids.
customer_reviews.text: Not for young kids. Mine are two and they just tear it apart since the pieces snap in. Also the ramp is for Mickey not a car. The car sits in the garage and mickey slides down the slide into the garage. It’s cute for older kids.
customer_reviews.author: Lincoln M.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 2 year old nephew and he LOVES IT! It is the best of both worlds for him Cars and Mickey! Was such a great gift for him.
customer_reviews.author: Myesha Kirby

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves this house
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my 3 year old Daughter and she loved it, she uses it all the time. It can definitely hold up to a kid using it everyday.
customer_reviews.author: shana boutin

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than I thought!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 and both kids loved it. It was a little difficult to put together but not too bad for the size.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for a little one who likes figurines
customer_reviews.text: Great toy for a little one who likes figurines. Great for imaginative play. The toy is good quality and the little zip line adds more movement and fun to it. My kids have a good time with this!
customer_reviews.author: Catie T.

customer_reviews.title: loved this so much I bought 2..
customer_reviews.text: my grandkids just love this so much. They like to watch the clubhouse show so this was a no brainer... easy to assemble,,,
customer_reviews.author: Happy Camper

customer_reviews.title: Very hard to break
customer_reviews.text: My three year old loved it. My 2 year old bruiser hasn't been able to break it, though he sure tries
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mickey Love
customer_reviews.text: My son LOVES Mickey. He is two years old. It was the perfect gift for him!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: When this went on sale I KNEW I had to get it for my Mickey clubhouse loving babies!! Can’t wait to give it to them for Christmas only complaint is it shows it’s ij a Mickey clubhouse box but IT ISNT it is in a roadster races box
customer_reviews.author: Tessa danielle elskes

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: It's very cute but if its for a 3 yr old or younger the parts come apart easy. No little parts but I have to constantly keep putting it together
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: My kids loved this
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for little ones. Bring your patience to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda T.

customer_reviews.title: I loved the toy i used it as a cake topper ...
customer_reviews.text: I loved the toy i used it as a cake topper and my son loved that he got to keep it . i just couldn't use all the toy for the cake because i made a 1/2 sheet cake but it still looked super cute ally guest's liked the cake
customer_reviews.author: Denia

customer_reviews.title: Just a discribed
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 1 yr old for Christmas! Cant wait for him to play with it. Its so cute.
customer_reviews.author: Esmeralda

customer_reviews.title: ... 18 month and 4 1/2 year old boys really enjoy this toy
customer_reviews.text: My 18 month and 4 1/2 year old boys really enjoy this toy! Just make sure you hold on to the instructions. They pulled a couple of pieces apart from the main body of the toy. That was fun trying to remember how to put it the right way. But it's fixed and providing tons of fun!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: this is so cute! I think it's well made, and it's hard to take apart. This is The toy for mmch fans
customer_reviews.author: Katie Bordom

customer_reviews.title: It's Great
customer_reviews.text: Comes just as pictured/described. It's a great toy. Easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle H

customer_reviews.title: M-I-C-K-E-Y my grandson loves it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves this! It was easy to put together. Only issue is Mickey doesn’t fit right in the car.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My Daughter LOVES this!
customer_reviews.text: She carrys Mickey around all the time now! She loves the fact she can push the button and the car comes out! The only flaw is the track isn't wide enough and if you don't put Mickey on it perfectly, he doesn't always make it without falling off.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Pandolfo

customer_reviews.title: Club House Fun
customer_reviews.text: Durable, entertaining, and colorful. The Club House is a hit with the kids. Would recommend and buy again.
customer_reviews.author: William Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Happiness in a Box
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big fan of anything Mickey. Almost did not want to give to birthday boy, wanted to keep to myself. But he was so happy I had to let go. :)
customer_reviews.author: OllieGirl

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: my daughter likes it but it doesn't keep her busy for long. wish the inside of the clubhouse was bigger and had more to offer. otherwise good quality.
customer_reviews.author: the b

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old absolutely adores this! I did buy the set of clubhouse pals to go with it, but it really wasn't necessary - he just loves sending Mickey down the slide and then out the door in his little car. Huge hit for us.
customer_reviews.author: amjekj

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase. It’s durable and my son absolutely loves it. If your child is a Mickey Mouse Clubhouse fan, this is a great toy for them to have.
customer_reviews.author: Lynessa L.

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is cute, well made and the grandbaby played with it for a long time!
customer_reviews.author: ppsker

customer_reviews.title: As shown
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and my son likes it. It doesn’t really do much so he lost interest kind of quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Fisher-Price DMC67 Disney Mickey Mouse Clubhouse – Zip, Slide & Zoom Clubhouse
product_meta.description: Style:SingleWelcome to Disney Junior's Mickey Mouse Clubhouse! Mickey Mouse is ready for a wild ride as he begins his journey in his hot air balloon! Raise the zip line and Mickey "flies" down in his balloon, landing on the lookout tower. Then Mickey takes a magical ride down the spiral slide, which swirls around the Clubhouse and ends in his boot-shaped garage where he lands right in his red car. Press the button inside the Clubhouse and Mickey's car launches out of the garage. Mickey can make a stop inside the Clubhouse and visit Toodles, hang out with the rest of the gang (sold separately), or go over the bridge and back to the balloon stand and start all over again! Zip, Slide And Zoom Clubhouse comes with a 3-inch (7.62cm) poseable Mickey figure and his classic red car. Other figures and accessories sold separately and subject to availability.
feature_bullets: 3 inch (7.62 centimeter) articulated Mickey figure with classic red car
